Class JDKChecker

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class JDKChecker
extends java.lang.Object
    Checks the current platform's Java Development Kit.

    • Method Detail

      • checkDefaultPath

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> checkDefaultPath()
        Check the default path. If a path is found, add this path to the ArrayList
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of the paths of JDK's in the current system

      • checkJAVA_HOME

        public java.lang.String checkJAVA_HOME()
        Check JAVA_HOME variable by checking the name of the files
        Returns:
        null, if there is no match; the name of the found file with jdk, if it is matched

      • checkPathVar

        public java.lang.String checkPathVar()
        Check the path variable
        Returns:
        null, if there is no path variable; file name, if there is a file which has path variable
